column5: That looks like the best way to hold a fish if you want to live release it. I'm sure that (what is it?) is most comfortable with it's neck bent at a 90 degree angle.
they "caught" it with bow and arrow I doubt release was ever an option

That looks like the best way to hold a fish if you want to live release it. I'm sure that (what is it?) is most comfortable with it's neck bent at a 90 degree angle. You see the Bow's doubt that fish is feeling anything
Yep, it's an Alligator Gar and it was bow fished. It's napping peacefully now.
Why do I think I seen this picture a few years ago?
Be gar that's a big fish!!

Why do I think I seen this picture a few years ago?
